英國《每日郵報》報道，英超紐卡素隊中出現幾個確診個案，球隊擔心將會有更多職球員確診。

這個擔心由周末出現5個新確診個案開始，當中涉及職球員，紐卡素的高層對此甚感擔憂。在未來48小時「喜鵲」將陸續收到其他檢測結果，有機會發現更多新個案。

消息指最少2個球員已在檢測中呈陽性反應，球隊的操練課已經暫停，並已安排所有職球員再次檢測，希望盡早確定疫情爆發的規模，再作後續安排。

英國《每日郵報》報道，英超紐卡素隊中出現幾個確診個案，球隊擔心將會有更多職球員確診。

這個擔心由周末出現5個新確診個案開始，當中涉及職球員，紐卡素的高層對此甚感擔憂。在未來48小時「喜鵲」將陸續收到其他檢測結果，有機會發現更多新個案。

消息指最少2個球員已在檢測中呈陽性反應，球隊的操練課已經暫停，並已安排所有職球員再次檢測，希望盡早確定疫情爆發的規模，再作後續安排。

replies.msg:
Matt Ritchie is back - and oh how Newcastle United have missed him.

As Newcastle limped through performances against Chelsea and Southampton devoid of leadership and passion the thought of Ritchie on the pitch shouting his teammates into line was something that crossed the mind of many.

Possibly due to impact of COVID-19 on the playing squad, Ritchie was given a starting place against West Brom and took it upon himself to prove just why he perhaps should be in that starting eleven from the start.

Ritchie, in what is perhaps his more favoured role on the left flank, was arguably the creative force of Newcastle as they searched for victory against the Baggies.

The Scottish international made more key passes - three - than any other player as he reminded Bruce of his attacking attributes.

Ritchie drove his side forward, playing Miguel Almiron in on the 15th minute, and then his sharp thinking to take a quick free-kick on the half-hour mark saw Joelinton played into the box, and force a good save from Sam Johnstone.
